metadata.Title: CVE-2019-14439 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: A Polymorphic Typing issue was discovered in FasterXML jackson-databind 2.xbefore 2.9.9.2. This occurs when Default Typing is enabled (either globallyor for a specific property) for an externally exposed JSON endpoint and theservice has the logback jar in the classpath.

criterions.comment: jackson-databind: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
